summary: Franklin G. Berger was born September 26, 1947, in Providence, R.I. Married Sondra J. Hebert, May 16, 1976. Franklin Berger is a cancer research scientist at Roswell Park Menorial Institute in Buffalo, N.Y. For confidential support call the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-8255 or go to www.suicidepreventionlifeline.org.
